## ESLint

- https://eslint.org/docs/latest/use/getting-started

```shell
yarn add -D eslint
```

```javascript title=".eslintrc.cjs"
module.exports = {
	root: true,
	extends: ["eslint:recommended"],
	parserOptions: {
		ecmaVersion: "latest",
		sourceType: "module",
	},
	env: {
		browser: true,
		es2021: true,
	},
};
```

```ignore title=".eslintignore"
### macOS ###
# General
.DS_Store

### JavaScript ###
# Dependencies
node_modules
pnpm-lock.yaml
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# Build
dist
build
```

### Prettier

- https://github.com/prettier/eslint-config-prettier?tab=readme-ov-file#installation

```shell
yarn add -D eslint-config-prettier
```

```javascript title=".eslintrc.cjs"
module.exports = {
	extends: ["prettier"],
};
```

### Typescript

- https://typescript-eslint.io/getting-started

```shell
yarn add -D @typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin @typescript-eslint/parser
```

```javascript title=".eslintrc.cjs"
module.exports = {
	extends: ["plugin:@typescript-eslint/recommended"],
	parser: "@typescript-eslint/parser",
	plugins: ["@typescript-eslint"],
};
```

## Prettier

```shell
yarn add -D prettier
```

- https://prettier.io/docs/en/configuration.html

```javascript title=".prettierrc.cjs"
module.exports = {
	printWidth: 100,
	singleQuote: false,
	trailingComma: "all",
	useTabs: true,
};
```

```ignore title=".prettierignore"
### macOS ###
# General
.DS_Store

### JavaScript ###
# Dependencies
node_modules
pnpm-lock.yaml
package-lock.json
yarn.lock

# Build
dist
build
```

```shell
prettier --write .
```

### TailwindCSS

- https://github.com/tailwindlabs/prettier-plugin-tailwindcss

```shell
yarn add -D prettier-plugin-tailwindcss
```

```javascript title=".prettierrc.cjs"
module.exports = {
	plugins: [
		"prettier-plugin-tailwindcss", // 다른 플러그인과 호환성을 위해 마지막에 추가
	],
	tailwindFunctions: ["clsx"],
};
```
